House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01208
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROHIBITING END OF CONTRACT (ENDO) PRACTICES OR LABOR CONTRACTUALIZATION
ABSTRACT : Seeks to protect and uphold workers’ rights to decent and long-term employment by upholding their right to security of tenure, declaring all forms of contractual employment and penalizing those who will carry out this anti-worker scheme.
